icon-prefix.description: Icon class name prefix, equivalent to the [class-prefix attribute](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon%23props) of the Icon component
icon-prefix.description_zh: 图标类名前缀，等同于 Icon 组件的 [class-prefix 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon%23props)

dot.description: Whether to display the small red dot in the upper right corner of the icon
dot.description_zh: 是否显示图标右上角小红点

badge.description: The content of the logo in the upper right corner of the icon
badge.description_zh: 图标右上角徽标的内容

badge-props.description: Customize the properties of the logo. The incoming object will be transparently passed to [Props of the Badge component](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/badge%23props)
badge-props.description_zh: 自定义徽标的属性，传入的对象会被透传给 [Badge 组件的 props](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/badge%23props)

url.description: Link address to jump to after clicking
url.description_zh: 点击后跳转的链接地址

to.description: The target routing object to jump to after clicking, which is equivalent to Vue Router's [to attribute](https://router.vuejs.org/zh/api/interfaces/RouterLinkProps.html#Properties-to)
to.description_zh: 点击后跳转的目标路由对象，等同于 Vue Router 的 [to 属性](https://router.vuejs.org/zh/api/interfaces/RouterLinkProps.html#Properties-to)

replace.description: Whether to replace the current page history when jumping
replace.description_zh: 是否在跳转时替换当前页面历史
